abstract: The company said its fourth-quarter results were bolstered somewhat by asset sales and improved profits in its chemical business.
snippet: The company said its fourth-quarter results were bolstered somewhat by asset sales and improved profits in its chemical business.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON — Exxon Mobil on Monday reported a sharp drop in fourth-quarter revenue and profit because of declining oil prices. But the company did better than many of its competitors, thanks to improved profit margins at its chemical business.

headline.main: Exxon Mobil Revenue and Profit Off 21% on Oil Decline
headline.print_headline: Exxon Mobil Revenue and Profit Off 21% on Oil Decline
